reviewText: You get what you pay for.

I wanted a tape that would teach me the basics on playing Roulette, but this tape not only taught me the basics, it explained everything from the actual layout to different betting techniques. Henry takes you through every possible combination that could be played and explains why it's easier to win at some more than others. An excellent tape for beginners and anyone that wants to learn how to win while playing Roulette.
if you want to learn the game of roulette you need to get this video.it makes the game very easy to understand and provides some betting systems as well
